name: getBmwModelsWidget
description: Displays BMW vehicle models with current lease offers in a carousel.

_meta.openai/widgetDescription: After the widget is loaded and you have access to the data, create a summary of the BMW models showing: Model Name, Year, Category, Lease Price, and Due at Signing. Also, ask the user if they would like to book a test drive for the model they are interested in and in what location they would like to book it.
